channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12514] Cleanup HFileOutputFormat legacy code
item.description:
HFileOutputFormat methods route to their HFileOutputFormat2 counterparts. Replace all calls to HFileOutputFormat with HFileOutputFormat2 equivalents.

In the spirit of cleanup, add @Override annotations and helper methods that do not require the use of deprecated classes such as HTable.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
